sentence: Trump initially supported former aide Max Miller in the 16th District to challenge Rep. Anthony Gonzalez, R-Ohio, voted to impeach Trump in the wake of the Jan. 6, 2021, attack on the Capitol.
author: Charlie McCarthy
title: Ohio GOP Rep. Gibbs Announces Retirement

sentence: Gibbs, first elected during the GOP wave of 2010, remains on the May 3 primary ballot against former Trump administration aide Max Miller in the 7th District.
author: Kate Ackley
title: Another House Republican facing a Trump-backed challenger retires

sentence: To that end, after considerable deliberation, I have decided to not seek re-election this year.” Gibbs was also facing Max Miller, a former aide to former President Donald Trump, in the Republican primary.
author: Clare Foran and Melissa Holzberg DePalo
title: Ohio GOP lawmaker announces retirement citing redistricting ‘circus’
